description_text:
Hey the haptics were not delivered is there possibly a picture of where
they were left? I got the pedals but no vam haptics

conversations.body_text: It said they were delivered but they arnt here
Hello, here is your shipping tracking link. Your package is expected to arrive around the 10th. https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=JSEIN2982987345YQ
